alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 8:40AM AKST until January 21 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FRONTAL PASSAGE LOOKS TO BRING SNOW TO HIGHER ELEVATIONS... .With cooler air in place at higher elevations, accumulating snowfall is expected as moisture moves into the area. Uncertainty is in the amount of moisture which would limit snow accumulations. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Along the Klondike highway. * WHEN...From noon Friday to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
